sentence.text: Deficiency in KrÃ¼ppel-like zinc finger transcription factor GLI-similar 3 (negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II) in humans is associated with the development of congenital hypothyroidism.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: However, the functions of negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II in the thyroid gland and the mechanism by which GLIS3 dysfunction causes hypothyroidism are unknown.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Our study identifies negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II as a key regulator of TSH/cell surface receptor signaling pathway-mediated thyroid hormone biosynthesis and proliferation of thyroid follicular cells and uncovers a mechanism by which GLIS3 deficiency causes neonatal hypothyroidism and prevents goiter development

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
